author: Simon Difford
description: Tequila-based, with complex mezcal smokiness, rich maraschino cherry and floral lavender bitters. It's a cocktail that likes dilution so perhaps consider serving on the rocks.
name: Sandy The Showgirl
recipeIngredient: 10 ml Chilled water (omit if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
